arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
translation: In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

arabic: اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ ۚ لَا تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلَا نَوْمٌ
translation: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining. Neither drowsiness overtakes Him nor sleep.

arabic: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغْ قُلُوبَنَا بَعْدَ إِذْ هَدَيْتَنَا وَهَبْ لَنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْوَهَّابُ
translation: Our Lord, let not our hearts deviate after You have guided us and grant us from Yourself mercy. Indeed, You are the Bestower.

arabic: إِذْ أَوَى الْفِتْيَةُ إِلَى الْكَهْفِ فَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا آتِنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً وَهَيِّئْ لَنَا مِنْ أَمْرِنَا رَشَدًا
translation: When the youths retreated to the cave and said, 'Our Lord, grant us from Yourself mercy and prepare for us from our affair right guidance.'

arabic: وَالَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
translation: And those who say, 'Our Lord, grant us from among our spouses and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous.'

arabic: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا عَلَىٰ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِن رَّحْمَةِ اللَّهِ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًا إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْغَفُورُ الرَّحِيمُ
translation: Say, 'O My servants who have transgressed against themselves [by sinning], do not despair of the mercy of Allah. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful.'

arabic: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
translation: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

arabic: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear...

arabic: اللَّهُ نُورُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ...
translation: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth...

arabic: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
translation: Say, 'He is Allah, [who is] One',

arabic: وَقَضَىٰ رَبُّكَ أَلَّا تَعْبُدُوا إِلَّا إِيَّاهُ وَبِالْوَالِدَيْنِ إِحْسَانًا...
translation: And your Lord has decreed that you not worship except Him, and to parents, good treatment...

arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاكُم مِّن ذَكَرٍ وَأُنثَىٰ...
translation: O mankind, indeed We have created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes that you may know one another...

arabic: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَآوَىٰ
translation: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?

arabic: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
translation: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

arabic: وَلَا تَهِنُوا وَلَا تَحْزَنُوا وَأَنتُمُ الْأَعْلَوْنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
translation: So do not weaken and do not grieve, and you will be superior if you are [true] believers.

arabic: وَإِن يَمْسَسْكَ اللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ فَلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُ إِلَّا هُوَ...
translation: And if Allah should touch you with adversity, there is no remover of it except Him...

arabic: الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَطْمَئِنُّ قُلُوبُهُم بِذِكْرِ اللَّهِ...
translation: Those who have believed and whose hearts are assured by the remembrance of Allah...

arabic: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي
translation: [Moses] said, 'My Lord, expand for me my breast [with assurance]...

arabic: لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
translation: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers.

arabic: وَالَّذِينَ جَاهَدُوا فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا...
translation: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways...

arabic: يَا بُنَيَّ أَقِمِ الصَّلَاةَ وَأْمُرْ بِالْمَعْرُوفِ...
translation: O my son, establish prayer, enjoin what is right, forbid what is wrong, and be patient over what befalls you...

arabic: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى الصَّابِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
translation: Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account.

arabic: فَمَا أُوتِيتُم مِّن شَيْءٍ فَمَتَاعُ الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا...
translation: So whatever thing you have been given - it is but [for] enjoyment of the worldly life...

arabic: هُوَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ...
translation: It is He who created the heavens and the earth in six days...

arabic: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَانصَبْ
translation: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship]...

arabic: وَالْعَصْرِ
translation: By time...

arabic: إِذَا جَاءَ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ وَالْفَتْحُ
translation: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest...

arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ
translation: Say, 'I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak'...

arabic: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
translation: Say, 'I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind'...
